caption: Really fun restaurant . Extremely visual and entertaining with creative dishes. Beautiful service. Overall an amazing experience and memory. Some of the dishes were wow like the aged tuna in smoked broth. Some like the lobster claws I think need some work. The sushi is amazing. The desert was also amazing.
This is a complete dining experience with sushi, sake, and dynamic atmosphere of colors, lights and ambiance.  My wife and I enjoyed our experience at Nossa Omakase.

The whole Hidden experience at Nossa Omakase was lovely! Mystery walk, great drinks at the bar, friendly staff from the beginning until the end and the most romantic ambience to share with your partner. Also, generous portions of delicious …

A classy and sensual experience with a great atmosphere, delicious and varied plates of food that came in unique and inspired presentations. A highly engaging ‘Chef’s Table’ experience that is ideal for a romantic night with your partner, …

(Translated by Google) Wonderful experience at Nossa Omakase, the entrance to the bar ... the cocktails, the attention of the staff ... incredible! There is something special about this place and it is the passion with which the chef makes …
I have been to most Omakase places in Miami but this one is out of this world. The set up; the entrance the food all just wow! There are so many amazing dishes. Service was impeccable. Thank you!

My wife and I went here last night for our anniversary dinner and were absolutely blown away! It was so much fun to get our private letter at the sushi restaurant out front with a description of how to find the “hidden” door and the …

Decided to have different experience and Nossa Omakase did not disappoint. The staff was so helpful especially after I made the mistake of not  reading the email that explains how to fully enjoy the Nossa. Read the email people! Lol. …

Wow what an amazing experience I had at Nossa Omakase! From the beginning where I was given a letter with my name giving my instructions how to enter their 'speakeasy lounge' it was like a cute treasure hunt experience to start off. …
Inventive, knowledgeable chef with a clear passion for his craft. A welcome addition to the omakase experiences Miami has to offer, all while paying tribute to his Brazilian and Japanese heritage.
The best Sushi in Miami and the spot for Omakase! I think this place deserve a Michelin 🌟!

A must go!!!   This experience will blow you away. Fenomenal food, amazing service and a spectacular presentation.  We had a set menu with 17 courses. Each course was different in that ans presentation.  Two thumbs up for this place. Call …

@nossaomakase wow! What an experience!! Not easy to find the combination of good food, service, and ambiance. Nosaa Omakase is not just good tho..it's OUTSTANDING. First, the food, the most important. Just the ginger alone was amazing. So …

Nossa Omakase is a must go! It’s an awesome one of a kind experience. We enjoyed every but every dish we got! There was no favorite because all were my favorite. It is a nice experience, atmosphere and very good service. If you want a nice evening with good food I would definitely recommend it 100%!

We recently booked our dinner party here and it was simply amazing! We had a small group of 8 and it was just us with the chef and staff. We were welcomed by a very friendly bartender after giving the secret code to the doorman and we …
Loved the food and the experience!

Favorite spot in Miami for udon. Their curry udon is mighty popular and flavorful. Their rice bowl + mini udon combo was larger than I expected, but unfortunately very salty (particularly the oyako donburi).
